sn56.43:1.2: Tattha yam kinci cakkhuna rupam passati, anittharupanneva passati no ittharupam; akantarupanneva passati no kantarupam; amanaparupanneva passati no manaparupam.
sn56.43:1.5: yam kinci manasa dhammam vijanati, anittharupanneva vijanati no ittharupam; akantarupanneva vijanati no kantarupam; amanaparupanneva vijanati no manaparupan”ti.
sn56.43:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn56.43:2.2: “maha vata so, bhante, parilaho, sumaha vata so, bhante, parilaho.
sn56.43:2.3: Atthi nu kho, bhante, etamha parilaha anno parilaho mahantataro ceva bhayanakataro ca”ti?
sn56.43:2.4: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, etamha parilaha anno parilaho mahantataro ca bhayanakataro ca”ti.
sn56.43:3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, etamha parilaha anno parilaho mahantataro ca bhayanakataro ca”ti?
sn56.43:3.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajananti …pe…
sn56.43:3.3: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajananti, te jatisamvattanikesu sankharesu abhiramanti …pe…
sn56.43:3.5: abhisankharitva jatiparilahenapi paridayhanti, jaraparilahenapi paridayhanti, maranaparilahenapi paridayhanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasaparilahenapi paridayhanti.
sn56.43:3.6: Te na parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
sn56.43:4.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajananti …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajananti.
sn56.43:4.4: anabhisankharitva jatiparilahenapi na paridayhanti, jaraparilahenapi na paridayhanti, maranaparilahenapi na paridayhanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasaparilahenapi na paridayhanti.
sn56.43:4.5: Te parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
sn56.43:5.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
